long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
SuperReader is a better way to consume the news.
We hide distractions like ads, newsletter forms, and anything else that is irrelevant so you could focus on the important thing, the content.

!!! PLEASE NOTE, THE FOLLOWING ARE THE ONLY CURRENTLY SUPPORTED SITES !!!
* walla.co.il
* ynet.co.il
* geektime.co.il
* israelhayom.co.il
* mako.co.il
* maariv.co.il

What can you do with SuperReader?
* Text to Speech - Free yourself to do whatever you want while hearing the contents of any news article. (English and Hebrew)
* Article or Ad?  - We make sure you're aware of whether or not the article your reading is an advertisement.
*  Dark mode

Change Log:

Version 1.1
* Fix support for ynet.co.il 
* Always open links in new tab
